Texts.Eng:
Armor Sphere Upgrade.
Hold Left-Click while transformed to Stun enemies on contact.
^red;Drains Energy while Stun is active.

Blood Aether Upgrade.
Blood Aether can sense enemies from 10 blocks further.
In addition, an enemy hit by your own Blood Aether will take more damage from all Blood Aethers.

Blood Aether Upgrade.
Upon killing an enemy with Blood Aether, gain 2 seconds of Rage and Weak Regeneration.

Consecutive Perfect Shields with the Vital Aegis increase its Power.
^red;Blocking regularly resets the current Power gain.
Danger Close
Decay
Description

Drill Sphere Upgrade.
Mid-air movement improved. Gain a mid-air jump.
Hold [W] while transformed to Glide.
^red;Energy drains while Gliding.
Early Bird

Energize Upgrade.
While Energy is full,
Grounded Jumps are further improved,
Fall Damage is further decreased,
and Mid-air jumps are increased to 3.

Enhanced Movement Upgrade.
Increased Sprint Speed. Increased Jump Height when jumping out of Sprint.
Increased Dash Duration increased. It is now possible to jump-cancel Dashes.

Escape! Upgrade.
Dashing into the ground provides a large boost in speed.
Fall Damage is negated for a short time after dashing.

Escape! Upgrade.
Walljumping is enabled with Escape!.
Mid-air dashes are replenished upon clinging to a wall.
Fighting Gravity

Flame & Infernal Affinity Upgrade.
Affinity Weaknesses no longer affect you.

Flame & Infernal Affinity Upgrade.
Sear lasts twice as long.

Flame & Infernal Affinity Upgrade.
When you kill a Burning, Melting, or Seared enemy, they explode.
Explosion Damage scales with Power Multiplier.

Frost & Cryo Affinity Upgrade.
Affinity Weaknesses no longer affect you.

Frost & Cryo Affinity Upgrade.
Deal +50% Damage with Bows. Hits with arrows always Embrittle for 3 Seconds.
Does not work with Adaptable Crossbow.

Frost & Cryo Affinity Upgrade.
The longer an enemy is Embrittled,
the more damage they take from outside sources.

Gravity Sphere Upgrade.
Hold Space while transformed to Hover towards the cursor.
^red;Drains Energy while Hover is active.
Hermes' Sphere
It's a Trap!

Knight Slam Upgrade.
Mid-air jumps increased to 3.
Slam Knockback Increased.
^red;Slam Damage Decreased.
Last Stand
Masochism
Momentum
Monster Master
Photosynthesis

Primed Nova Upgrade.
Primed Nova can be over-charged,
boosting Power. The status caused
by each explosion is upgraded.
^red;Enemies no longer explode when killed.

Primed Nova Upgrade.
Primed Nova charges faster and has a larger casting range.
^red;However, its overall Damage is Decreased.

Ravenous Spira Upgrade.
Deal double damage to enemies. Able to drill nearer to the weapon's base.
^red;Energy drains at twice the speed.

Ravenous Spira Upgrade.
Ravenous Spira breaks background blocks when held in the Right Hand (Secondary Hand).
^red;Energy cannot be regained from breaking background blocks while holding Shift.
Sadism

Shadow Step Upgrade.
Shadow Step now allows the user to phase through walls, even if the user is currently in an Instanced World.

Shock & Arc Affinity Upgrade.
Affinity Weaknesses no longer affect you.

Shock & Arc Affinity Upgrade.
Upon inflicting Overload Status,
Gain Rage for a 2 Seconds.

Shock & Arc Affinity Upgrade.
While wet or touching liquid,
nearby entities are shocked repeatedly.

Siphon Flux Upgrade.
Restore Energy to nearby Allies when Lightning Slice connects with an enemy.

Siphon Razor Upgrade.
Critical Slice can be used after three attacks instead of four.
^red;However, this prevents the usage of your other fist weapon's combo finisher.

Siphon Spore Upgrade.
Deals more damage when your health is below one third.
Stunning Armor

Tank Sphere Upgrade.
Rockets fired while transformed actively seek targets with direct line of sight.

Test to see font size as well as total wrapping length. Hopefully we can get this sizeable chunk of text into this small area, because if not, we'll have issues in the future with describing various upgrades. I also need to check total length up and down, just because.
Title
Total Blackout

Translocate Upgrade.
Translocate now allows the user to teleport through walls, even if the user is currently in an Instanced World.
True Vampire
Unstoppable

Vanish Sphere Upgrade.
Vanish Sphere no longer provides Invulnerability. Instead, hold Left-Click while transformed to enable Ghost-Mode, enabling you to move through walls. Be careful, as your breath runs out while moving through walls.
^red;Drains Energy while Ghost is active.

Venom & Toxic Affinity Upgrade.
Affinity Weaknesses no longer affect you.

Venom & Toxic Affinity Upgrade.
The clouds spawned at your feet inflict Weak Poison.

Venom & Toxic Affinity Upgrade.
Toxified enemies have a 5% Chance
to Toxify nearby enemies every 0.25 Seconds.

Versa Ricochet Upgrade.
Versa Ricochet fires immediately when charged, and takes shorter time to charge fully.

Vital Aegis Upgrade.
The 8th and 9th Combo Steps Stun enemies on hit.
Wall Jump
